科.definition: branch of study; administrative section; division; field; branch; stage directions; family (taxonomy); rules; laws; to mete out (punishment); to levy (taxes etc); to fine sb; CL:個|个[ge4]

科什圖尼察.definition: surname Kostunica; Vojislav Kostunica (1944-), Serbian politician, last president of Yugoslavia 2000-2003, prime minister of Serbia 2004-2008

科企.definition: science & technology and industry; tech company

科儀.definition: ritual (Daoism); scientific instrument (abbr. for 科學儀器|科学仪器[ke1 xue2 yi2 qi4])

科利奧蘭納斯.pinyin: kē lì ào lán nà sī

科名.definition: rank obtained in the imperial examinations; scholarly honors

科學.definition: science; scientific knowledge; scientific; rational; CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4],種|种[zhong3]

科學執政.definition: governance based on rationality, evidence and scientific principles

科學技術是第一生產力.pinyin: kē xué jì shù shì dì yī shēng chǎn lì

科學技術現代化.pinyin: kē xué jì shù xiàn dài huà

科學發展觀.definition: Scientific Outlook on Development, a guiding principle for the CCP attributed to Hu Jintao 胡錦濤|胡锦涛[Hu2 Jin3 tao1], incorporated into the Constitution of the CCP in 2007

科學編輯.definition: editor of a scientific journal, publication etc

科室.definition: department; administrative division; unit (e.g. intensive care unit)

科布多.definition: Qobto or Kobdo, khanate of outer Mongolia

科幻.definition: science fiction; abbr. for 科學幻想|科学幻想[ke1 xue2 huan4 xiang3]

科技感.definition: high tech feel (of a product etc); the impression that sb's looks are artificial, affected by cosmetic procedures

科技臉.definition: a face noticeably modified by plastic surgery, botox etc

科技驚悚小說.pinyin: kē jì jīng sǒng xiǎo shuō

科教片.definition: science education film; popular science movie

科教興國.definition: to invigorate the country through science and education

科斗.definition: tadpole; also written 蝌蚪[ke1 dou3]

科普.definition: popularization of science (abbr. for 科學普及|科学普及[ke1xue2 pu3ji2]); (attributive) popular science; (coll.) to explain in layperson's terms

科普特人.definition: the Copts, major ethnoreligious group of Egyptian Christians

科朗.definition: colón (currency of Costa Rica and former currency of El Salvador)

科林斯.definition: Corinth, a city-state of ancient Greece; Corinth, a modern city in Greece; (name) Collins

科爾.definition: Kohl (name); Helmut Kohl (1930-2017), German CDU politician, Chancellor 1982-1998
